column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Deep dish pizza is great (as far as deep dish is concerned)
column2: however the amount of sauce on the pizza was ridiculously heavy. Maybe that's the way they do it in Chicago? Also I along with two of the other folks in my party couldn't taste the pepperoni in our personal pizzas because they were extremely thin cut. However
column3: my father in laws pizza was great - lots of sausage on his pizza.
